channel.title: macos on Gokhun
channel.description: Recent content in macos on Gokhun

item.title: Creating a macOS Statusbar Application
item.description: In this post we will create a macOS statusbar application. In order to follow this tutorial you will need following items: A device that is capable of running macOS Big Sur Xcode (I am using Version 13.2.1 (13C100)) Create Project Open Xcode and create new project. Select App under macOS platform Enter your product name (Statusbar) Select Team if you have one or let Xcode generate one (My developer account)

item.title: ScreenLight
item.description: A macOS application to use your displays as light sources
